com.capitrium.twitterauth
Class TwitterTasks

java.lang.Object
  com.capitrium.twitterauth.TwitterTasks

public class TwitterTasks
extends java.lang.Object

Nested Class Summary
static class TwitterTasks.TwitterGetAccessTokenTask
          AsyncTask used to get an AccessToken to access the user's Twitter data; launches ReturningUserActivity if we successfully got an AccessToken, otherwise UserLoginActivity is relaunched
static class TwitterTasks.TwitterGetRequestTokenTask
          AsyncTask used to get a RequestToken, starting the Twitter login process for the current user.
static class TwitterTasks.TwitterPostStatusTask
          An AsyncTask which will use the access token/secret for the current user to post a status to their Twitter page.
